channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Instytut Badań Pollster for TVP1, 29–30 March 2018 – Seat Projections
item.description:
• Prawo i Sprawiedliwość (ECR): 21–24 seats
  • Platforma Obywatelska (EPP): 11–14 seats
  • Kukiz’15 (*): 5–7 seats
  • .Nowoczesna (ALDE): 3–5 seats
  • Polskie Stronnictwo Ludowe (EPP): 0–4 seats
  • Sojusz Lewicy Demokratycznej (S&D): 3–5 seats
  • Wolność (EFDD): 0 seats
  • Partia Razem (*): 0–3 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by Instytut Badań Pollster for TVP1, 29–30 March 2018 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
